Definition at line 90 of file Error.php.

static formatError ( $  params,
&$  smarty 
) [static]

Smarty function to format errors for easy reference in templates. Uses erroritem.tpl, if available.

Takes in a "id" parameter with the ID of the error group to return. If "id" is empty or undefied, all errors are returned.

Parameters:
string $params Parameters passed to the Smarty function
Smarty $smarty Reference to the Smarty object calling this function
